title: ML Pipeline using Python
features: Designed and implemented a scalable end-to-end ML pipeline in Python, integrating data ingestion, feature engineering, model training, and automated evaluation to reduce processing time by 35%.
Containerized the pipeline with Docker and integrated CI/CD workflows, ensuring reproducible experiments and seamless deployment across environments.
Optimized model selection and hyperparameter tuning with Optuna, boosting predictive accuracy by 12% and documenting insights in the README for stakeholder transparency.
